page.title: 07The Sports Centre
page.content: Rothwell sports centre was built in March 1974.About 2,500 people use the centre each week.There are facilities for{tennis,squash,judo,badminton, } {trampolining,swimming,weight {lifting,football,netball and snooker.} The most popular sport at the moment is badminton,but it used to be squash.The most popular days are Monday to Friday,from about 5'o clock to 9'o clock.About thirty people are employed at the sports centre though most of them are part time staff like bar staff and cleaners.The sports centre is not doing so well so the sauna and the snack bar have been closed down.The new manager is making special offers to try to get more people in.
